reviewText: I was surprised to see that my copy arrived with a copy of the coveted Little Golden Book by Doctor Suess titled, "Gerald McBoing Boing"!  Wow, what a very pleasant walk back in time!
I grew up with Gerald and I am looking forward to sharing the fun with my grandson!

I thought this would be the full episodes that included the Fairy Tale bits - unfortunately, it's only the Fairy Tale bits, so a bit shorter than I was expecting.  Also stated it includes the Little Golden Book of Gerald McBoing Boing, but it is a cheap paper rendition stapled together with a very poor binding and I don't expect it to last long.

I remember this from my childhood in the 50's, although some episodes have been updated.  Great mid-century animation and the funny premise of a boy who can't say words, just sounds.  My grand daughter was mesmerized.
This is an oldie but goodie. Good, clean movie for younger children. My seven year olds will watch this over and over again and imitate the "boing" noise.
I have a 2 and 5 year old ... they absolutely LOVE these movies!!!!!  I definitely recommend them!  The movies arrived in great condition.
My two kids, aged 6 and 4, both thoroughly enjoyed this DVD, and it is one that they want to repeatedly watch. Very entertaining and great stories. I would definitely recommend this for young kids.
I wish there were more DVDs in this series. My 3 year old and 7 year old both enjoy this dvd. It had been all around the country and they are not tired of it yet.
